1. C U R R I C U L U M V I T A E P e r s o n a l D e t a i l s Name : Helmi Hadi Ziliwu Date of Birth Place of Birth : : September 10th 1986 Gunungsitoli Religion : Islam Sex : Male Nationality : Indonesia E d u c a t i o n B a c k g r o u n d Education Location Period Kindergarten TK Aisyiah Bushtanul Athfal, Sibolga, Sumatera Utara 1991 – 1993 Elementary School SDN 2 Gunungsitoli, Nias, Sumatera Utara. 1993 – 1999 Junior High School SLTP Negeri 1 Gunungsitoli, Nias, Sumater Utara. 1999 – 2002 Senior High School SMU Negeri 1 Gunungsitoli, Nias, Sumatera Utara. 2002 – 2005 Collage Bachelor Degree of UPI – YAI, Department of Industrial Engineering. 2005 – 2010 O r g a n i z a t i o n E x p e r i e n c e a n d A c t I v I t I e s Specification Period Familiarity Night Committee of Industrial Engineering "Incamp" 2006 Visit Factory PT Indofood 2007 Visit Factory PT Toyota Indonesia 2007 Social service "Caring Earthquake Engineering Jogya" 2007 Visit Factory PT YAKULT Indonesia 2007 Visit Factory PT Krakatau Steel 2008 Helmi Hadi. Z Jl. Jatiroto I Atas No. 9, Jaticempaka RT/RW 10/007 Jatiwaringin, Pondok Gede, Bekasi 17411 Phone +6282125370703 E-mail : helmyzil@gmail.com helmyziliwu@gmail.com

2. 3. 3.
